@forbidden_waifu: It is pretty much hopium. I have a good story about that. I actually used to look up porn tags like oldvsyoung, and I was one of those stereotypically undesirable males in High School: fat, nerdy, geeky interests, unathletic. Thing is though that my position never really changed all that much. I did become more attractive in a nuanced kind of way. However, the 'curve' started falling as I went through my 20s. By my late 20s I started noticing all these looks from women about my age. I had to reflect to rationalize it. So why? Turned out many of my old peers turned out terribly. They had issues like alcoholism, drug addiction, family court judgments, divorce and spousal maintenance, dad bods... simply put, I actually turned out to be ahead of the curve simply by not changing all that much. My niche interests even became attractive. There is hope for everyone so long as you make the right choices in life and put in a little care.
